title: An example of a good remake.
review: It's certainly not scary. This movie relies on being unsettling or creepy rather than being truly scary. But that doesn't really matter, in this case. This film is exactly what a remake should be. It's well acted, has characters you can actually root for, and even has some laughable and sad moments.

title: A genuinely unsettling thriller
review: This movie had me on the edge of my seat. The imagery is terrifying and the story keeps you intrigued throughout the entirety of the film.

title: A great portrayal of Mexican culture.
review: This movie had me in tears. It's so lovable, and is so inspiring.
